item.title: RegEx resources
item.description: Updated: ğŸ“† 2018-04-06. Regular Expressions, RegEx, regexpsâ€“ call them what you like, but no matter how you slice it, theyâ€™re useful af. After all, data spelunking is all about patterns, and thatâ€™s precisely what regexps are for: (wo)manhandling patterns in strings. Good Sirs Wickham and Grolemund, in their masterful tome, r4ds, describe them thusly: They [regexps] take a little while to get your head around, but once you understand them, youâ€™ll find them extremely useful.
